name: mygallery
description: - `npm init -y`  - create folder structure for back-end - install neccessary dependencies for back-end development (cors, nodemon, etc...) - type: "module" to use ES6 in the backend - Express:  	- Set up Express: `cors()`, `json()`, `urencoded()`, etc 	- MongoDB Atlas cluster setup 	- Connect to MongoDB using mongoose 	- `app.listen()` - create routes in a separate directory - create logic of routes handlers in controller directory: this is the logic for each request. Need to put them in a separate folder as a good practice. (Then move to client side to create basic structure like Form, Post)

scripts.install-client: cd client && npm install && npm run build
